languages.text: "Признавать свою неправоту тяжело, маршал. Вы оступились, доверившись Вультур, но я верю, что сейчас вы сделаете правильный выбор".
"It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."
languages.original_text: "Признавать свою неправоту тяжело, маршал. Вы оступились, доверившись Вультур, но я верю, что сейчас вы сделаете правильный выбор".

traits.locale_text: "It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."
"It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."
"It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."
"It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."
"It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."
"It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."

languages.text: «Es difícil admitir los errores, Mariscal. Se ha equivocado al confiar en Vultur, pero tengo fe en que ahora tomará la decisión correcta».
languages.original_text: "It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."

traits.locale_text: «Es difícil admitir los errores, Mariscal. Se ha equivocado al confiar en Vultur, pero tengo fe en que ahora tomará la decisión correcta».

languages.text: “元帅，承认自己做错了是件非常困难的事情。你犯了错误，轻信了沃尔图尔的一面之词，但我相信，你此刻会做出正确的选择。”
languages.original_text: "It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."

traits.locale_text: “元帅，承认自己做错了是件非常困难的事情。你犯了错误，轻信了沃尔图尔的一面之词，但我相信，你此刻会做出正确的选择。”

languages.text: 「将帥、自分が間違っていたと認めるのは難しい。君はヴァルターを信頼して失敗したが、今こそ正しい選択をしてくれると信じている」
languages.original_text: "It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."

traits.locale_text: 「将帥、自分が間違っていたと認めるのは難しい。君はヴァルターを信頼して失敗したが、今こそ正しい選択をしてくれると信じている」

languages.text: "Es ist schwierig, zuzugeben, dass man sich irrt, Marschall. Ihr seid über Euer Vertrauen in Vultur gestolpert, aber ich glaube daran, dass Ihr jetzt die richtige Entscheidung treffen werdet."
languages.original_text: "It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist schwierig, zuzugeben, dass man sich irrt, Marschall. Ihr seid über Euer Vertrauen in Vultur gestolpert, aber ich glaube daran, dass Ihr jetzt die richtige Entscheidung treffen werdet."

languages.text: "İnsanın hata yaptığını kabul etmesi zordur. Miralay, Vultur'a güvenerek hata ettin. Ancak şu anda doğru seçimi yapacağına inanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanın hata yaptığını kabul etmesi zordur. Miralay, Vultur'a güvenerek hata ettin. Ancak şu anda doğru seçimi yapacağına inanıyorum."

languages.text: « Il n'est guère aisé de reconnaître qu'on est dans l'erreur, maréchal. Vous avez fauté en plaçant votre confiance en Vultur, mais j'ai bon espoir que vous ferez le bon choix à présent. »
languages.original_text: "It is a difficult thing to admit that one is in the wrong, Marshal. You have stumbled by putting your trust in Vultur, but I have faith that you will make the right choice now."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'est guère aisé de reconnaître qu'on est dans l'erreur, maréchal. Vous avez fauté en plaçant votre confiance en Vultur, mais j'ai bon espoir que vous ferez le bon choix à présent. »
